translation-reason-missingOutputKey: Wɔnnhuu nkyerɛase biara a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw
translation-reason-missingOutputValueHas: Wɔanhunu hash biara wɔ cache file no mu
msg-rate-limited-sleeping: Wɔahyehyɛ sɛ wɔnnyina no; wɔrehyɛ da ma %%interval%%s...%%attemptStr%%
msg-translation-reason-outputFileDidNotE: Faịl a wɔfrɛ no %%outputFile%% nni hɔ
msg-translation-reason-missingOutputValu: Ɛnhwɛ mfomso bi wɔ cache fael mu
error-value-not-a-string: Ɛyɛ sɛ ɛka a ɛtɔ so "%%key%%" ɛyɛ "%%type%%". Wɔretwa sɛ ɛbɛyɛ nkɔtɔ! Wɔreto so...
error-value-not-in-reference-data: Bɔkɔ "%%key%%" nni hɔ wɔ abakɔsɛm fael no mu
error-bad-reference-file-ext: Mfa fael a wɔntumi nnye ho kwan "%%ext%%" nni saa fileType no so
error-reference-var-not-found-in-data: Entumi hu "%%referenceExportedVarName%%" wɔ abakɔsɛm fael "%%referenceFile%%" mu. Woka sɛnea ɛteɛ sɛ wobɛka eyi anaa?: %%possibleKeys%%
error-invalid-llm-model: Mfomso LLM a wɔahyehyɛ no nni mfaso: %%model%%
error-context-prefix-and-suffix-not-defi: Ebia na context prefix anaa context suffix no sɛɛso na wɔdefinii no.
error-unknown-provider: Provider a ennim "%%providerName%%". Providers a wɔtumi ma no: %%validTranslationProviders%%
error-no-reference-language: Ɛnsi kasa a ɛyɛ adanse no. Fa --reference-language nhwɛso anaa kyerɛw 'referenceLanguage' wɔ wo config fael mu.
error-no-target-languages: Wɔnhwɛ asɛm biara a wɔde bɛkyerɛ. Fa --target-languages nhwɛso anaa kyerɛ 'targetLanguages' wɔ wo config fael mu.
error-no-reference-data-in-variable: Ennhu sɛdeɛ biara wɔ "%%referenceExportedVarName%%" mu wɔ "%%referenceFile%%" mu
